item.description:
Group member, Lou Swinand, will exhibit his photographs during the month of February on the 1st Floor of the main Worcester Library, 3 Salem Square, Worcester, MA.

The work may be viewed during normal library hours. Check the library for days and hours: Phone: 508-799-1655, Web site: www.worcpublib.org.

 

The exhibit, “Faces & Places,” features portraits and scenic work. An opening reception will take place Sunday, February 6, 1:30 to 3:30 pm in the Banx room.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Banx Room
item.why: Supporting group members and seeing cool photos- of course

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Worcester Library Photo Show of Lou Swinand Photos
